items.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
items.simple_description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

items.name: Chicken Alfredo
items.simple_description: Creamy pasta with grilled chicken, parmesan cheese, and Alfredo sauce.

items.name: Beef Tacos
items.simple_description: Soft tacos filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

items.name: Vegetarian Stir-fry
items.simple_description: A mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried with tofu in a savory sauce.

items.name: Mango Smoothie
items.simple_description: A refreshing smoothie made with fresh mango, yogurt, and honey.
